title: can't play league!! pvp.net patcher kernel not working

replies.body: Usually this means that for whatever reason your computer may be running into a permissions error when trying to update/install the game.  Fortunately we have a handy article about [how to set up permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)!  Let me know if this fixes it or not :D
